summary: Theme toggle bug fix verified - All theme functionality working correctly. Light/Dark theme toggle on Settings page works, theme persists across navigation, visual indicators (checkmarks) update correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Theme toggle bug has been fixed. ThemeContext provides global theme state management. Theme buttons have data-testid attributes: 'theme-dark-btn' and 'theme-light-btn'. Theme is saved to localStorage and backend API. CSS overrides in index.css apply light theme styles globally.

theme_toggle_light.details: Clicking 'Açık Mod' button switches to light theme - HTML class changes from 'dark' to 'light'

theme_toggle_dark.details: Clicking 'Koyu Mod' button switches to dark theme - HTML class changes from 'light' to 'dark'

theme_persistence.details: Theme persists when navigating from Settings to Home page - localStorage saves theme preference

theme_visual_indicators.details: Checkmark appears on selected theme button, border styling changes to indicate selection

light_theme_visual.details: Light theme: white background (rgb(255,255,255)), dark text (rgb(30,41,59)), proper contrast

dark_theme_visual.details: Dark theme: black background, light text, proper contrast maintained

test_flow: 4. Verify dark theme is default (HTML class='dark', checkmark on 'Koyu Mod')
6. Verify theme changes (HTML class='light', checkmark moves to 'Açık Mod')
8. Verify theme persists (HTML class='light', background white, text dark)
9. Return to settings, click 'Koyu Mod' (Dark Mode)
10. Verify theme changes back to dark
